key.description: Unique ID of this dApp Store

minAge.description: The min age of user who should access this dApp Store

isForMatureAudience.description: Boolean to signify if the dApp Store is for mature audience

logo.description: A URL to the logo of the dApp Store. Should be square and 512x512 in PNG format

banner.description: A URL to the banner of the dApp Store. Should be 1920x1080 and in PNG format

screenshots.description: A list of URLs to the screenshots of the dApp Store. Should be 1284 x 2778 and in PNG format

geoRestrictions.description: A list of countries where the dApp Store is available or unavailable. If this is not present, the dApp is available everywhere. If this is present, then one of either allowedCountries or blockedCountries should be present. If both are present, then the dApp is available in allowedCountries and unavailable in blockedCountries. The name of countries should be in ISO-3661-1 Alpha-2 Code.

blockedCountries.description: A list of countries where the dApp Store is unavailable

url.description: The URL of the dApp Store

language.description: A string in ISO-639-1 which signifies the language of the dApp Store

bannedDAppIds.description: List of dApp IDs that are banned in this store. The dApp IDs should be the same as the ones in the dApp Store's dApps list.

dappsEnrich.description: List of a dapp with properties to change values for the dapp store
